word: Brother Ings had done great good here in instructing the people. They have enjoyed listening to him for they say he makes everything so clear and easy to be understood. He has been very active in working. He has employed his time fully and is much liked. We are of good courage. We leave here tomorrow morning.--Letter 108a, 1886, p. 2. (To W. C. White (?), Oct., 1886. Fragment of Letters.)
